SELECT activity.id id, activity.address_district district , activity.coord_long coordLong, activity.coord_lat coordLat, activity.recruit_person_number recruitPersonNumber, activity.picture picture, COUNT(if(activity_user.activity_user_status_id=2, TRUE, NULL)) AS recruitedPersonNumber, ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( #{coordLat} * PI() / 180 - activity.coord_lat * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS(#{coordLat} * PI() / 180) * COS(activity.coord_lat * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN( ( #{coordLong} * PI() / 180 - activity.coord_long * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) ) AS distance FROM activity_user RIGHT OUTER JOIN activity ON activity_id = activity.id GROUP BY activity.id ORDER BY activity.`timestamp`
AND activity.name LIKE #{activityName}
